news.summary: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos told young entrepreneurs that building real-world experience before starting a company can dramatically improve the odds of success. news.headline: Amazon buys $97 million mega warehouse to expand US distribution network
news.summary: Amazon has paid $97.6 million for a massive warehouse and distribution center located in Ocala, Florida.
